description: This file defines the AppRouter class responsible for routing within a Flutter application, handling initial route display and route generation based on authentication state.

classes.name: AppRouter
classes.description: Router for navigating between login and home screens based on app state.

methods.name: initialRouteWidget
methods.description: Returns the widget for the initial route depending on whether the app is bootstrapping or user is authenticated.

methods.name: onGenerateRoute
methods.description: Generates routes dynamically for '/login' and '/home' paths.
